column1: Make sure you have a plan to vote. One more day until #ElectionDay https://t.co/r225fL2b4K
I will always defend the 2nd Amendment and your right to keep and bear arms. https://t.co/TC05lVftw6
I will stand with Law Enforcement. https://t.co/4Dp044pcp8
Never forget the innocient lives that were lost and the sacrifices that were made by so many first responders. https://t.co/GT2ynzEdZx
I had a wonderful time at the Wood County Republican Executive Committee annual summer picnic. If you get a chance stop by their headquarters office in Vienna. https://t.co/PcSMFOy9DX
Starting today you can begin requesting your absentee ballots.
I'm asking my fellow West Virginians to do their part in protecting the most vulnerable among us. #Maskup https://t.co/Oh79H8JVlO

With 88 days until Election Day please keep these important dates in mind.                                                              August 11 – October 28 2020 - Eligible voters may apply for a General Election ballot by mail. October 13 2020 - Voter Registration Deadline.
Small businesses have been hit especially hard during the pandemic. Let's all do our part by supporting the local businesses in our community. Your neighbors are counting on it!
Law Enforcement puts their lives on the front line everyday to protect our communities. I will always defend our LEO's! https://t.co/Cm3ncgmhss
We have 98 days until Election Day! https://t.co/dVqXivTpPo

It is a privilege to have earned the support of the West Virginia Building Trades. I'll always have the back of West Virginia's blue-collar workers and will work with President Trump to Make America's Economy Great Again. https://t.co/Ps220S5Eha

It's time to get West Virginia back to work - proud to have the U.S. Chamber of Commerce support my campaign and I look forward to working with them to get our economy back on track. https://t.co/dggoIiKZzY
Honored to have the support of the UMWA. West Virginia miners know a hard day's work better than anyone and I will continue to be a strong advocate for coal jobs. https://t.co/bkD9S2IHx7
